Biography

2008 game-by-game statistics

2007 game-by-game statistics

2007: Collected All-GLVC Honorable Mention as a utility player…garnered 164 at bats, mostly at second base and designated hitter…also started 10 games on the mound…hit .274 and compiled a 3.81 ERA…started the year on a seven-game hit streak while batting .433 over that span…drove in a season-high four runs against #23 Ouachita Baptist (2/18 [1])…hit first collegiate homerun in that game…swiped four bases the following game against OBU (2/18/ [2])…had a four-hit game with a double and a homerun against Southern Arkansas (2/25 [1])…tied for the team lead with five pitching wins…orchestrated a complete-game, six-strikeout performance in a win over St. Joseph’s (3/20 [2])…kept the Hounds’ postseason hopes alive with a complete-game win over NKU on the regular season’s final day (5/7 [1]).

High School: Earned seven varsity letters at Hauser High School … starred on both the mound and at second base … twice named All-Area Player of the Year by the Republic … two-time First Team All-State honoree … struck out 181 batters in 133.1 innings pitched and tossed three no-hitters as a prep … compiled a 1.77 ERA as a senior … slugged a gaudy 1.011 as a junior with help from ten home runs … managed a 1.530 OPS in senior campaign.

Personal: Psych major … National Honor Society member as a prep.

No stats available for the current season.
